column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Strolled in here on a Thursday night around 7:30 hoping to get a table for two - no reservations or anything. We figured if they couldn't take us
column2: we'd just hop over to Gilt or something like that. They were able to seat us
column3: and boy am I glad we had the chance to eat here! As this place beomes more popular
column4: who knows how crazy it'll become
column5: but I hope they can keep up the service and quality.
